properties.description: This data flow processes internet order blobs from the storage account to DW.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as string,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as string,
		product as string,
		units as string,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersInputSource
